markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6184) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=659" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 175 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Alchemist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=228)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence +2

</column>

---

You put your alchemical interest into practice. You become trained in alchemical bombs, the alchemist class DC, and Crafting; if you were already trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You gain the [Quick Alchemy](/Rules.aspx?ID=3282) benefits, creating up to 4 versatile vials during your daily preparations. Add the formulas for four additional common alchemical items to your formula book, in addition to those you gain from [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5117).

<title level="2">Alchemist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Advanced Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=6185), [Alchemical Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=6189), [Basic Concoction](/Feats.aspx?ID=6186), [Voluminous Vials](/Feats.aspx?ID=6188)
name: Alchemist Dedication
